docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by attorney Alexandra Brodsky rejects claim, made in gender discrimination lawsuit filed against Minnesota public school district, that allowing transgender girls to use girls' bathroom violates privacy rights of non-trans girls; asserts lawsuit's argument assumes transgender girls are boys, and is disingenuously couched in feminist language in order to appeal to liberals.

headline.main: Don’t Use Girls as Props to Fight Trans Rights
